chars.name: Default
chars.description: The song defaults to its character.

chars.name: Classic Fit
chars.description:
One of her favorite outfits to wear around Ben. Picked during a 'Day Date' with Ben before they started dating.
However, she gets cold quickly in this; and always asks for cuddles from Ben.

chars.name: Current Fit
chars.description:
Her comfortable, warm and downright adorable new sweater was given to her by Ben on Christmas 2021.
The new pants and shoes slow the time in which she gets cold.

chars.name: Halloween Costume
chars.description:
She decided to go as a demon for Halloween. How cool is that?
The candy buckets are laid aside for Ben's preformances

chars.name: Date Outfit
chars.description:
An outfit chosen to match Ben. Although her dress doesn't have the same design as Ben's shirt; It's still pretty snazzy.
The black, laced undergarments were picked out by Ben while they were shopping for 'Date Clothes'.

chars.name: 'Christmas' Outfit
chars.description:
A set of clothes made to keep Tess snuggly and warm.
Her bell earings really get her into the holiday spirit!

chars.name: Lab Suit
chars.description:
A suit designed to protect you from the harsh chemicals while 'cooking'.
Weirdly draws annoying flies towards you...

chars.name: Summer Outfit
chars.description:
Her simple purple shirt and dark short shorts make Ben's heart melt while also keeping her cool!
May also be used as PJs.

chars.name: Morning Outfit
chars.description:
A outfit made from Ben's favorite shirt and Tess' short shorts.
Her go to pair of PJs after a night of...uh...yeah y'know.

chars.name: Club Member
chars.description:
A nice uniform that is required to be worn durring school hours.
Smells like a mixture of Ben, Old Books and Tea.
chars.lock: Survive the first encounter with the one who breaks the fourth wall.

chars.name: Trepidation Fit
chars.description:
A nice formal outfit thats perfect for fighting...creepypastas?
Also, Breasts.
Suggested by @ASweetMidnight on twitter <3

chars.name: R.D's Take
chars.description:
Rampant Dabbler's take on Tess.
(Boob window in sweater hahahaha)
Suggested by: @Rampant_Dabbler on twitter <3

chars.name: Princess' Drip
chars.description:
A dress made to rule a kingdom.
Always smells like cake or the inside of a volcanic castle.
Suggested by @MelancholyMoni_ on twitter <3

chars.name: goljie's Redesign
chars.description:
goljie's (on newgrounds.com) (very cool) base game Girlfriend.
Now with a Left Sides flavor.
(Suggested by @HankKD7 on twitter <3)
